scripts.qa: npm run clear-qa-report & wdio run ./user/qa/qa.conf.js & npm run generate-qa-report
scripts.qa-cross: npm run clear-qa-report & wdio run ./user/qa/qa.cross.conf.js & npm run generate-qa-report
scripts.generate-qa-report: npx allure generate ./report/qa/allure-results --clean -o ./report/allure-report & npm run report-open
scripts.dev: npm run clear-dev-report & wdio run ./user/dev/dev.conf.js & npm run generate-dev-report
scripts.dev-cross: npm run clear-dev-report & wdio run ./user/dev/dev.cross.conf.js & npm run generate-dev-report
scripts.generate-dev-report: npx allure generate ./report/dev/allure-results -o ./report/allure-report --clean ./report/allure-report & npm run report-open
